titles.title: To extend the temporary duty reductions and suspensions on certain wool products, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
12/18/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary duty reductions and suspensions on certain wool products, and for other purposes.
